item.title: Report X-2024021583
item.description:
Report X-2024021583

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-06T18:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-14
  • City: SHREWSBURY
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: HAZMAT PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO THE DMP BECAUSE IT NEEDED TO BE AUDITED. AN ODOR WAS COMING FROM THE BOX. ONE OF THE INNER CONTAINERS WAS LEAKING. PACKAGE WAS PROCESSED USING THE DECISION TREE FOR OXIDIZERS.

item.title: Report X-2024021582
item.description:
Report X-2024021582

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-06T18:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-14
  • City: SHREWSBURY
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: DAMAGED HAZMAT WAS FOUND OUTSIDE THE TRAILER IN THE UNLOAD. PACKAGE WAS REMOVED FROM THE TRAILER AND WAS LEAKING OUT THROUGH THE GRATES ONTO THE CONCRETE BELOW. PACKAGE WAS CONTAINED USING THE DECISION TREE FOR FLAMMABLE LIQUIDS AND BROUGHT TO THE DMP. PACKAGE WAS THEN PROCESSED USING THE DECISION TREE FOR FLAMMABLE LIQUIDS.
